summary: Daedric 1H weapons are now stronger than Ebony 1H weapons.
descriptionHtml:
In vanilla Skyrim, Ebony 1H weapons have the same stats that Daedric 1H weapons have, but easier to forge, and lighter. This simple mod changes it.
(SCREENSHOTS SHOW THAT DAEDRIC MACE AND SWORD HAD 2 POINTS OF DAMAGE MORE THAN EBONY MACE AND SWORD, but this was just my fault. Still not sure if mace have 2 points more than ebony)
Daedric 1H weapons have been slightly buffed in stagger chance, crit damage and speed, but nothing serious.
Check my other mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53472/?]UH - Unique Housecarls[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53656/?]Dremora Race Optimized[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53669/?]Better Reward for destroying the Dark Brotherhood[/url]
author: Spr1t3
